import React, {useState} from 'react'; import api from '../api'; export default function Register({onSwitch}){ const [form,setForm]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:''}); const [msg,setMsg]=useState(''); async function submit(e){ e.preventDefault(); try{ const res = await api.post('/api/auth/register', form); setMsg('Registered! You can now login.'); console.log(res.data); }catch(err){ setMsg(err.response?.data?.msg || 'Error'); } } return (

Register

setForm({...form,name:e.target.value})} /> setForm({...form,email:e.target.value})} /> setForm({...form,password:e.target.value})} />
{msg}
); }
